name: FacAutoScreenshot_Updated
title: Screenshot Toolkit temp Update
author: Anders142536, R3CONN3R
description:
* Screenshots a selected area, similar to programs like the Windows Snipping Tool, Greenshot or Flameshot.
* Automatically does screenshots of the whole base in set minute intervals, designed for timelapses.

Written to be performance friendly. Aims to be your do-it-all toolkit for screenshots.
